project_descr: Support to National E-Government Strategy: to contribute on enhancing the productive capacity of poor; enhancing access to and the performance of social services; local level capacity building and promoting participatory communication system

outputs.output_descr: The project The aim of the project is to improve efficiency in internal government operations, public service delivery and to provide for open and transparent processes including greater citizen participation and involvement. Other related outputs include hands on training for government web portal administrators, the development of websites for 22 government agencies, advocacy campaigns for government and the general public providing support to the E-Readiness Assessment Report and the establishment of a secure e-government data center and disaster recovery site.
